snippet.title: LUNARK - WayForward Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Join the revolution in the cinematic platformer LUNARK from developer Canari Games and publisher WayForward! Embark on a classic-style sci-fi adventure and run, jump, hang, climb, roll, and shoot your way to freedom against a totalitarian regime! Planned for release on Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox, PC, and Mac in the second half of 2022. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1050370/LUNARK/
